subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Even when it was in American waters for more than 140 years, the America’s Cup never had this grand a stage, and the question worth asking is if it is still America’s cup at all.
snippet: Even when it was in American waters for more than 140 years, the America’s Cup never had this grand a stage, and the question worth asking is if it is still America’s cup at all.
